title: Whoever bought the PC796 Sepia set on HA

posts.post_title: Whoever bought the PC796 Sepia set on HA
posts.post_content: If you bought it with the intention of selling-off the cards individually, please message me.
Ditto. I would be interested in the Crawford😁

Most, but not all will be in my Sept/Oct auction, sold as individual lots.

Scott
Scott, will you have the Wagner for auction?

Lay off Paul! That Wagner is the reason I started this thread!!! 

Just kidding. It actually WAS the motive behind my thread, but luckily, I found one. It’s all yours :) Good luck at auction.
Yes, the Wagner will be one of the offerings.

Forgive me if this was mentioned elsewhere, but Where can I follow
These auctions?
Will the rarest card of the set be in the auction?   Plank
No, it will not. All that were in the Heritage lot except Mathewson, Plank, Chase and Street will be offered.
